TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XamlReader extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class XamlReader Implements IDisposable
public ref class XamlReader abstract : IDisposable

summary.span: 为使用 XAML 输入并生成 XAML 节点流的类提供基定义。

span.span: Provides base definitions for classes that consume XAML input and produce XAML node streams.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个抽象类，不提供实现或定义的所有成员的工作结果。 is an abstract class and does not provide implementations or definitions that have a working result for all members. 成员中具有实现的记下注释中的该成员。Members that do have an implementation in are noted in the remarks for that member. 具体而言，具有几个必须实现的抽象成员和多个虚拟成员。Specifically, has several abstract members that must be implemented, and several virtual members. 虚拟成员和每个提供适用于大多数情况下的默认实现。Of the virtual members, and each provide a default implementation that is appropriate for most cases. 但是，并的默认实现依赖于实现的 XAML 读取器的其他预期的行为; 具体而言，它们依赖于重写。However, the and default implementations rely on other expected behavior of the implementing XAML reader; in particular, they rely on the override. 也是有一个工作的默认实现的虚拟成员。 is also a virtual member that has a working default implementation. 以下两个类是在.NET Framework XAML 服务和 System.Xaml 程序集最密切且最实用的派生的类：The following two classes are the most relevant and practical derived classes in .NET Framework XAML Services and the System.Xaml assembly: - 其中读取对象图，如在运行时的应用程序的活动对象图。, which reads an object graph, such as the active object graph of an application at run time. - 其中通过使用一种通用读取 XAML 形式的 XML 文本文件加载该文件作为中间帮助器类。, which reads XAML in the form of a XML text file by using a general that loads the file as an intermediary helper class. 其他 XAML 读取器的其他框架包括和。Other XAML readers from other frameworks include and . 不同于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmldom](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmldom-md.md)]并设计原则，因为没有`Create`方法以返回 XAML 读取器实现的基础的默认值。 differs from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmldom](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmldom-md.md)] and design principles because does not have a `Create` method to return underlying default XAML reader implementations. 通过调用其构造函数或其他特定于类的帮助器 Api，你必须改为实例化特定派生的 XAML 读取器类。You must instead instantiate specific derived XAML reader classes by calling their constructors or other class-specific helper APIs. ## 子树读取器Subtree Readers 大多数情况下，调用派生自特定 XAML 读取器类的上下文中的 API 。For the most part, you call API in the context of specific XAML reader classes that derive from . 但是，在一个特定的情况下，你访问API 对实际的 XAML 读取器实例不是公共的和不派生自或。However, in one particular case, you access API on a practical XAML reader instance that is not public and not derived from or . 这种情况下在调用时处于，它将返回实例。This case is when you call , which returns a instance. 在默认实现中， ，它是此 API 返回的是一个内部类。In the default implementation, the that is returned by this API is an internal class. 获取的子树读取有有效的 Api 操作，如和，并且这些操作基于父读取器类。The obtained for subtree reading has valid actions for APIs such as and , and those actions are based on the parent reader class. 此设计使要跟踪其中输入子树的框架级别的内部类。This design enables the internal class to track the frame level where the subtree was entered. 操作子树可确保，如果当前节点的位置移动到的子树的边界以外，特定子树读取器报告文件结尾或`null`在当前节点。The acting subtree makes sure that if the current node position is moved beyond the bounds of the subtree, the specific subtree reader reports end-of-file or `null` at the current node. 有关子树读取器使用情况的说明包含在特定Api。Notes about subtree reader usage are included on certain APIs.

related.span: 了解 XAML 节点流结构和概念

span.span: Understanding XAML Node Stream Structures and Concepts

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，获取一个值，该值报告读取器位置是否位于文件结尾。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, gets a value that reports whether the reader position is at end-of-file.

value.span: 如果位置在 XAML 节点流的概念上的文件末尾，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the position is at the conceptual end-of-file of the XAML node stream; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 子树读取器可以调用，与行为是否正确反映了输入的子树的边界。Subtree readers can call , with behavior that correctly reflects the bounds of the entered subtree. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"子树读取器"部分，或参阅。For more information, see the "Subtree Readers" section in , or see .

value.span: 当前成员；如果读取器位置不在成员上，则为 。

span.span: The current member; or , if the reader position is not on a member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 子树读取器可以调用，行为限制。Subtree readers can call , with behavior restrictions. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"子树读取器"部分，或参阅。For more information, see the "Subtree Readers" section in , or see .

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，从当前节点中获取 XAML 命名空间信息。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, gets the XAML namespace information from the current node.

value.span: 如果可用，则为当前节点中的 XAML 命名空间信息；否则为 。

span.span: The XAML namespace information, if it is available; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 API 的预期的设计是要返回非 null 结果才的当前节点是。The intended design of this API is to return a non-null result only if the of the current node is . 属性不会报告适用于对象或常规范围意义中的成员的 XAML 命名空间，根据说明下的 XAML 架构上下文。The property does not report the XAML namespace that applies to objects or members in a general scoping sense, as interpreted under a XAML schema context. 你的应用程序必须提供一种方式来使其执行操作的缓存信息 XAML 命名空间会遍历 XAML 节点，如果你需要这些信息以外的 XAML 架构上下文如何到编写器报告它的方式。Your application must provide a means to cache information for the acting XAML namespace as it traverses XAML nodes, if you need that information in a manner other than how the XAML schema context reports it to a writer. 请参阅了解说明的引用实现。See for notes on the reference implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Xaml.XamlReader ReadSubtree() cil managed
Public Overridable Function ReadSubtree () As XamlReader
abstract member ReadSubtree : unit -> System.Xaml.XamlReader override this.ReadSubtree : unit -> System.Xaml.XamlReader

summary.span: 返回基于当前 的 ，其中返回的 用于循环访问 XAML 节点结构。

span.span: Returns a that is based on the current , where the returned is used to iterate through a subtree of the XAML node structure.

returns.span: 子树的新 XAML 读取器实例。

span.span: A new XAML reader instance for the subtree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法具有默认实现，并返回一个有效。This method has a default implementation and returns a valid . 返回是一个内部类，用于限制某些操作。The returned is an internal class that restricts certain actions. 限制是一致、 目的在于读取仅划分维度的子树的较大源的 XAML 节点集，返回文件尾或`null`在当前节点的子树退出时。The restrictions are consistent with the purpose of reading only a dimensioned subtree of a larger source for a XAML node set, and of returning end-of-file or `null` at the current node when the subtree is exited. 通常情况下，应检查当前节点从初始以确定是否需要子树读取器。Generally, you should check the current node from the initial to determine whether you need a subtree reader. 如何检查这可能是特定于实现的;但是，避免创建多个为每个子树的子树读取器。How you check this may be implementation-specific; however, avoid creating multiple subtree readers for every subtree. 此外，请避免调用某些节点情况下的子树读取器 (例如，对于)，不能包含节点的子树。In addition, avoid invoking a subtree reader for certain node cases (for example, for ) that cannot contain a subtree of nodes. 获取子树读取器之后，必须调用它以获取当前节点 (或调用以获取下一个节点)。After you obtain a subtree reader, you must call on it to obtain a current node (or call to obtain a next node). 未自动获得初始节点位置从子树读取器时创建它。You do not automatically obtain an initial node position from the subtree reader when you create it. 读取器通过调用获取从此默认实现是一个内部类。The reader you obtain by calling from this default implementation is an internal class. 内部类的行为基于实现，它正在使用时调用。The internal class bases its behavior on the implementation that is being used when is called. 内部类的目的是包装和常规遍历行为。The purpose of the internal class is to wrap the and general traversal behavior. 遍历返回的预期的子树内保持通过跟踪 / 对或 / 对。The traversal stays within the intended subtree by keeping track of / pairs or / pairs. 也可以正确返回`false`有关并`true`为当读取器末尾的子树中，由其入口点定义。It also correctly returns `false` for and `true` for when the reader is at the end of the subtree, as defined by its entry point. 一般情况下，您假定任何API 从子树读取器调用具有相同的实现作为整体除外遍历绑定行为。In general, you assume that any API you call from a subtree reader has the same implementation as the overall except for the traversal bounding behavior. 但是，是虚拟的。However, is virtual. 因此，特定于实现可以提供与不同的行为内部包装的行为; 和一个实现甚至可以禁用的子树读取器功能通过返回或其他异常。Therefore, a specific implementation can provide behavior that differs from the internal wrapper behavior; and a implementation can even disable subtree reader functionality by returning or other exceptions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Skip() cil managed
abstract member Skip : unit -> unit override this.Skip : unit -> unit

summary.span: 跳过当前节点并将读取器位置推进到下一个节点。

span.span: Skips the current node and advances the reader position to the next node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一次跳过默认情况下调用实现。Once skipped, is called by the default implementation. 通常不调用和序列中。You typically do not call and in sequence. 在默认实现，具体取决于执行不同操作读取器位置是目前已打开。In the default implementation, different actions are taken depending on which the reader position is currently on. 如果读取器位置当前所在或，将跳过成员或对象。If the reader position is currently on a or , that member or object is skipped. 对于其他值，不执行任何操作之外调用从当前位置。For other values, no action is taken other than calling from the current position. 子树读取器可以调用，行为限制。Subtree readers can call , with behavior restrictions. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"子树读取器"部分，或参阅。For more information, see the "Subtree Readers" section in , or see . 节点树行为基于的 XML 等效项。The node tree behavior of is based on the XML equivalent . 基于行为等效性跳过此节点及其子树，而不仅仅是单个条目节点。Based on the behavior equivalence, skips the node and its subtree, not just the single entry node.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.IDisposable.Dispose() cil managed
